summary: Pure bash version bump script with sed for plugin version management
context: Plugin has two version files (.claude-plugin/marketplace.json and plugin/.claude-plugin/plugin.json) that must stay in sync. No automation existed for bumping versions.
rationale: Bash + sed has zero dependencies, works on macOS and Linux, and keeps the script simple. Reads current version from plugin.json as source of truth, supports both exact versions and patch/minor/major auto-increment.

alternatives.reason_rejected: Heavier than needed for two sed replacements, would need to handle JSON formatting
Only works on package.json, not arbitrary JSON files like marketplace.json and plugin.json
